pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create (Advanced) Coupled Matrix and Tensor Factorization Models // Creation and selection of (Advanced) Coupled Matrix and Tensor Factorization (ACMTF) and ACMTF-Regression (ACMTF-R) models. Selection of the optimal number of components can be done using 'ACMTF_modelSelection()' and 'ACMTFR_modelSelection()'. The CMTF and ACMTF methods were originally described by Acar et al., 2011 doi:10.48550/arXiv.1105.3422 and Acar et al., 2014 doi:10.1186/1471-2105-15-239, respectively.
